page.title: 03ELPHINSTONE MOBILE SERVICES
page.content: EVERY MONDAY AT ABOUT 3:00PM THE MOBILE LIBRARY PARKS AT THE POST OFFICE.THERE ARE TWO PEOPLE IN THE LIBRARY, A DRIVER AND A LIBRARIAN. I HAVE BEEN A MEMBER OF THE LIBRARY FOR ABOUT SIX YEARS. IT IS VERY HANDY SINCE I CAN'T GET TO THE ONE IN TRANENT. THEY HAVE A SELECTION OF BOOKS AND YOU GET TO KEEP THE BOOKS FOR TWO WEEKS. SOMETIMES I GET TO TAKE ADULT'S BOOKS. ABOUT 50 PEOPLE GO TO THE MOBILE LIBRARY FROM ELPHINSTONE. THE MOBILE LIBRARY LEAVES ABOUT 3:40PM. THERE ARE THREE OTHER VANS THAT COME INTO ELPHINSTONE. THE FISHMONGERS VAN COMES ON THURSDAY. THE STORE VAN COMES ON MONDAY,WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY. THE BAKERS VAN COMES EVERY DAY EXCEPT SATURDAY.
